description: Rotting pumpkins, “Ghostbusters” costumes and Michael Jackson’s “Thriller”: Halloween has come to Hawkins, Ind.
title: ‘Stranger Things’ Season 2: Watch the Full Trailer
title_page: ‘Stranger Things’ Season 2: Watch the Full Trailer - The New York Times
maintext:
Rotting pumpkins, “Ghostbusters” costumes and Michael Jackson’s “Thriller” can only mean one thing: Halloween has come to Hawkins, Ind.
‘Stranger Things’
Where to watch: Netflix
Add it to your Watchlist
A generous, new trailer for the nine-episode second season of Netflix’s “Stranger Things” begins as Will Byers (Noah Schnapp) and his pals play the classic game “Dragon’s Lair” at a video arcade. Suddenly, the other kids disappear, the power cuts out and Will watches a frightening silhouette appear in a blood-red sky. Our young hero has survived his journey to the Upside Down, but just as the cliffhanger ending of the show’s first season suggested, that nightmare realm isn’t finished with him — or the town of Hawkins — yet. The clip ends with a brief, cryptic glimpse of Millie Bobby Brown’s breakout character, Eleven.
